name: .XWMC File Extension
summary: Learn about .XWMC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: XWMC files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the Xaero's World Map mod automatically reads an XWMC file when Minecraft is launched. However, players may back up or transfer XWMC files to retain settings across installs or devices.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
